name: Astrix Health
headline: Astrix builds AI purchasing agents for healthcare providers.
description: Astrix builds AI purchasing agents for healthcare providers. Astrix agents normalize and aggregate billions of data points on medical supply pricing allowing providers to make informed purchasing decisions.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:machine-learning; industry:collaboration; industry:healthcare; industry:supply-chain; location:new-york

founders.name: Abhinav Swaminathan, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder / CEO @ Astrix Health.

Background in economics and computer science. Previously led healthcare distribution and AI projects at Palantir. Before that was at various healthcare organizations working on big data projects, namely Duke Health, MedStar Health, and on the VBC side, Evolent Health.

founders.name: Thomas Blake, Founder
founders.description: Founder / CTO @ Astrix Health. Studied Applied Maths at Oxford with a focus on Healthcare and Machine Learning. Spent a couple of years at Palantir, building out some of the earliest generative AI workflows in healthcare. Now focusing on using AI to reduce the administrative load on clinics and hospitals.

generated_description:
### Summary of Astrix Health

Astrix Health is a forward-thinking startup that launched in 2024, aiming to revolutionize the healthcare purchasing landscape through artificial intelligence. Their mission is straightforward yet impactful: they build AI purchasing agents that help healthcare providers make data-driven decisions about medical supplies.

The company has developed a sophisticated system that normalizes and aggregates billions of data points related to medical supply pricing. This capability allows providers to navigate the often murky waters of supply costs with ease, ultimately leading to more informed purchasing choices.

Astrix Health is based in New York and is part of Y Combinator's F24 batch, a hotbed for innovative startups. Though small, with just two employees, the company is poised to make significant strides in the healthcare sector with the backing of Y Combinator and the insightful guidance of their Group Partner, David Lieb.

The core tags associated with Astrix Health indicate a strong emphasis on artificial intelligence, machine learning, collaboration, and supply chain solutions within the healthcare domainâ€”areas that are ripe for disruption.

For more insights into their offerings and developments, you can visit their website at [Astrix Health](https://www.astrix.health). Keep an eye on this company; they are building tools that could change how healthcare providers procure essential supplies, potentially leading to better patient care and more efficient operations across the board.
